Class BinarySearchArray<E extends java.lang.Comparable<? super E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BinarySearchArray<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Comparable object that will be kept in Binary Search Tree Array
    public class BinarySearchArray<E extends java.lang.Comparable<? super E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Array based Binary Search Tree class

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public E find​(E target)
        Searching function to find an object. Calls a recursive helper method to find.
        Parameters:
        target - Target object
        Returns:
        Return the found object

      • add

        public boolean add​(E object)
        First, checks whether the object will be add is in the tree. If it is not, calls a recursive method to find correct node and to add the object
        Parameters:
        object - The object that will be add
        Returns:
        If the adding process is done successfuly, return true; else false

      • removeRecursively

        public E removeRecursively​(E object,
                           int index,
                           int level)
        Recursive method to find target node and remove it
        Parameters:
        object - Target node to delete
        index - Current index in the recursive function
        level - Current depth in the recursive function
        Returns:
        If the removing process is done successfuly, returns true; else false

      • remove

        public boolean remove​(E object)
        Remove method that calls the recursive function to find target node and remove it
        Parameters:
        object -
        Returns:

        public E delete​(E object)
